greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A002487(A048675(n)).
comment: Like A323902 and A323903, this also has quite a moderate growth rate, even though some terms of A048675 soon grow quite big.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to Stern's sequences
program: A002487(n) = { my(s=sign(n), a=1, b=0); n = abs(n); while(n>0, if(bitand(n, 1), b+=a, a+=b); n>>=1); (s*b); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 22 2019
